by or to everyone in a nation: She's a nationally known columnist.
More examplesFewer examplesThe city's housing costs were enough to earn it a ranking of 66th nationally.They used a nationally representative sample of 200 schools.Abortion was legalized nationally in the United States following the Roe versus Wade case.
